title: H thng phun thuc cng ngh cao #shorts

tasks.task: Sit on a tractor while it’s in motion
subtasks: Sit on the tractor seat
Hold onto the handles while the tractor moves

tasks.task: Drive a tractor with a load of hay
subtasks: Operate the tractor controls to move the hay wagon
Secure the load of hay on the wagon
Navigate the tractor around the field

tasks.task: Open a gate on a fence
subtasks: Approach the gate
Lift the gate control mechanism
Pass through the opening
Close the gate behind
Locate the gate bar
Lift and push the gate bar to open the gate
Position the trailer under the manure pile
Use a shovel or pitchfork to load manure into the trailer
Secure the load on the trailer

tasks.task: Attach a garden tiller to a tractor
subtasks: Connect the tiller's hitch to the tractor
Tighten the connection points
Hook up hydraulic lines if necessary
Walk to the soil pile
Scoop soil into the wheelbarrow
Tilt the wheelbarrow to unload into a planting area
Retrieve a garden hose from storage
Connect the hose to the water source
Walk through the rows, directing water to the plants

tasks.task: Lift hay into a loft area
subtasks: Reach into the hayloft opening
Spin the hay using a pitchfork or loader arm
Place the hay in the designated storage area

tasks.task: Drive a truck to a farm field
subtasks: Enter the truck cab
Start the truck engine
Drive the truck onto the field’s access road

tasks.task: Drive a hay wagon over bumpy ground
subtasks: Adjust the tractor speed to match road conditions
Maintain control of the wagon while driving over uneven terrain
Wedge the pesticide sprayer nozzle into the nozzle box
Prime the sprayer
Walk through the rows, applying the pesticide
Start the mower engine
Guide the mower over the field, avoiding obstacles
Collect the cut hay into windrows

tasks.task: Ride a tractor with a young foal
subtasks: Hold onto the foal while seated on the tractor
Sit down on the tractor
Buckle up if seat belts are available

tasks.task: Lift and move a garden tiller
subtasks: Stand up and grip the tiller handle
Lift the tiller off the ground
Tilt it to the side for moving

tasks.task: Get on and off a tractor
subtasks: Approach the tractor
Step onto the step or ramp
Sit down in the seat
Properly secure oneself before starting
Position the spreader under the manure pile
Use a scoop or fork to load the manure
Transfer the load to the spreader chassis

tasks.task: Water a garden with a soaker hose
subtasks: Connect the soaker hose to a hose bib
Unroll the hose in the garden beds
Open the valve and allow water to seep into the soil

tasks.task: Drive a chisel plow over a field
subtasks: Engage the chisel plow to turn the soil
Control the speed to prevent damage to the plow
Navigate around field edges and obstacles

tasks.task: Use a pitchfork to load grain into a bin
subtasks: Stand near the grain bin
Load grain onto the bin platform with a pitchfork
Guide the grain into the bin’s spout
Position the manure spreader over a field bed
Open the shoot gate or lift the shield
Empty the manure spreader’s load

tasks.task: Fill a hay bale with silage
subtasks: Scoop silage from the storage area into the bale wrapper
Operate the hay baler to form the bale
Transfer the bale from the wrapper to the storage area
Inspect the fence for damages
Gather necessary tools and materials
Restore the fence to its original condition
Monitor the planter’s depth as it’s inserted into the soil
Ensure proper spacing between seeds
Adjust the speed to avoid overwhelming the crew

tasks.task: Mow grass with a lawn mower
subtasks: Set the mower height for the current grass height
Navigate around obstacles such as garden beds and trees
Kneel down beside the bed to reach the weeds
Pull weeds by hand, being careful not to damage plants

tasks.task: Water crops with an irrigation system
subtasks: Activate the irrigation system controls
Check for any leaks or misdirected water flow
Monitor the crop fields while the system runs
Climb the ladder to access the tree branches
Use pruning shears to cut back excessive growth
Remove any diseased or dead branches
Distribute hay or feed into the animals’ stalls
Check water tubs for cleanliness and refill as needed
Observe the animals for signs of illness or injury
Position the milk tube properly around the cow’s teat
Squeeze the teat gently to stimulate milk flow
Collect the milk into a container

tasks.task: Walk a horse around a field
subtasks: Lead the horse with a halter and lead rope
Ensure the horse is moving safely around the perimeter
Operate the spreader’s discharge mechanism
Navigate the spreader through the fields

tasks.task: Use a hand plow to turn soil
subtasks: Grip the hand plow handle firmly
Push the plow into the soil, turning it over
Walk in straight lines or patterns for efficient coverage
Drive to the manure pile and stop the spreader
Use a spade or shovel to load manure into the spreader hopper
Tamp down the load to maximize capacity
Collect a grain sample using a probe or auger
Use a moisture meter to test the sample
Adjust storage or drying plans based on results
Measure the necessary posts and materials
Drive fence posts into the ground
Install wire or twine to connect the posts
Control the disc harrow depth and speed
Navigate the harrow over the field, turning over residue
Inspect the field for unevenness or equipment issues
Determine the appropriate amount of fertilizer based on soil tests
Load the fertilizer onto a spreader
Operate the spreader to apply the fertilizer evenly

tasks.task: Water plants with a garden watering can
subtasks: Unscrew the watering can’s lid
Pour water into the plants’ soil, avoiding leaves
Rescrew the lid tightly after use

tasks.task: Attaching a cultivating tool to a tractor
subtasks: Connect the tool’s three-point hitch to the tractor
Secure the hydraulic lift arms
Check the attachment for loose connections
Position the wagon near the hayloft
Lift the wagon’s dump lever to release the hay
Shovel remaining hay down the chute
Open the seed box door or hopper
Fill the box with the appropriate seed variety
Lock the seed box cover in place
Identify the correct gate for access
Lift the gate hinges manually or with a hoist
Swing the gate to the open position

tasks.task: Measure field boundaries with a measuring wheel
subtasks: Push or pull the measuring wheel along the boundary
Record the distances as needed for mapping or planning

tasks.task: Use a rototiller to aerate soil
subtasks: Adjust the rototiller’s depth setting
Start the tiller and move it through the soil, covering the desired area
Check for any missed spots or required passes
Diagnose the fence post’s problem
Replace or reinforce the post with new materials
Retighten the wire or fencing around the post once repaired

tasks.task: Apply a pesticide with a boom sprayer
subtasks: Prime the sprayer and calibrate the nozzles
Drive through the fields, monitoring spray patterns
Check nozzles for clogs or leaks during application
